title: Al may drive 20% revenue deflation in IT services over CY25
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) could trigger around 20 per cent revenue deflation in the global IT services sector between calendar years 2025 and 2030, posing significant headwinds for the industry, according to a report by Jefferies.

title: Gen-Z employees are coaching older colleagues to use AI
description: Gen-Z employees are driving the adoption of artificial intelligence at work by helping older colleagues upskill on the technology, according to an IWG report.
content:
Gen Z employees are not only embracing artificial intelligence, but they're also driving adoption of the technology in many workplaces, a new survey showed.
Nearly two-thirds of younger employees are actively helping older colleagues in adopting and ... [2806 chars]

title: AI Is Now Helping Farmers Rebuild After Climate Disasters: This African Country Sets Example. Know How
description: Artificial intelligence has the potential to uplift agriculture in sub-Saharan Africa, where an estimated 33-50 million smallholder farms like Maere's produce up to 70-80% of the food supply, according to the U.N.'s International Fund for Agricultural Development.
content:
Alex Maere survived the destruction of Cyclone Freddy when it tore through southern Malawi in 2023. His farm didn't.
The 59-year-old saw decades of work disappear with the precious soil that the floods stripped from his small-scale farm in the foothi... [5133 chars]

title: DeepMind CEO Says AI Could Shorten Drug Discovery From Years to Months
description: Discovering new medicines takes years and is marred by an astronomical failure rate. The Nobel Prize-winning head of Alphabet Inc.’s artificial intelligence lab says the technology will soon trim that time to under a year.
content:
(Bloomberg) -- Discovering new medicines takes years and is marred by an astronomical failure rate. The Nobel Prize-winning head of Alphabet Inc.’s artificial intelligence lab says the technology will soon trim that time to under a year.

title: As AI Tools Reshape Education, Schools Struggle to Draw the Line on Cheating
description: The book report is now a thing of the past. Take-home tests and essays are becoming obsolete.High school and college educators around the country say student use of artificial intelligence has become so prevalent that to assign writing outside of the classroom is like asking students to cheat.

title: Alibaba Stock Pops 6% In Hong Kong As Homegrown AI Chips Rival Nvidia's H20, $3.2 Billion Bond Raise Fuels Rally
description: Alibaba Group stock jumped 6.35% on the Hong Kong Exchange Thursday morning, extending its remarkable 83.95% year-to-date gains as investors reacted positively to the Chinese e-commerce giant's aggressive artificial intelligence expansion strategy and $3.2 billion fundraising.
content: Alibaba Group Holding Limited BABA BABAF jumped 6.35% to HK$152.40 ($19.58) on the Hong Kong Exchange on Thursday morning, extending its remarkable 83.95% year-to-date gains as investors reacted positively to the Chinese e-commerce giant’s aggressive... [2304 chars]
